alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Paulding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 31 at 12:17AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Sweetwater Creek near Powder Springs affecting Paulding and Cobb Counties. For the Sweetwater Creek...including Powder Springs, Powder Springs, Northwest Austell, Powder Springs, Austell, Austell, Austell 6S... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Sweetwater Creek near Powder Springs. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding will occur in the woodlands...fields and pastures of the natural flood plain upstream and downstream from the gage at Brownsville Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 PM EST Thursday the stage was 13.1 feet and rising. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:45 PM EST Thursday was 13.1 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 13 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.3 feet on 02/07/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
